original_text:
The light of a lamp
    will never shine in you again.
The voice of bridegroom and bride
    will never be heard in you again.
Your merchants were the world’s important people.
    By your magic spell all the nations were led astray.
korean_text: 등불 빛이 결코 다시 네 안에서 비치지 아니하고 신랑과 신부의 음성이 결코 다시 네 안에서 들리지 아니하리로다 너의 상인들은 땅의 왕족들이라 네 복술로 말미암아 만국이 미혹되었도다

sentences.original_text: will never shine in you again
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 너 안에서 빛나지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: The voice of bridegroom and bride
will never be heard in you again
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 너 안에서 들리지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your merchants were the world's important people
all the nations were led astray
